Yay exciting news!! ğŸŒ¿ I'll be going LIVE this Friday with one of my best friends @loveandsplendor to chat about our mutual love of essential oils. ğŸ’• If you've been following along for awhile you know how much I've loved using oils- from diffusing to making rollers and even some nontoxic cleaning products. They've made a huge difference in my life, and I've learned everything I know from Angel! Meet us online this Friday, 4/28 at 2:30p Pacific Time, as we share about how we use essential oils in our daily lives. It will be tons of fun and we are giving away an ENTIRE Premium Starter Kit (11 oils + diffuser, priced at $160 and worth twice that) to one very lucky viewer. If you can't watch live, we will have a way to enter the giveaway by watching the replay over the weekend. More details coming over the next few days but mark your calendar now for Friday at 2:30p PT. Also if you have any questions you'd like us to answer or talk about let me know!!
